name: Survival System | Grown Assets
description:
The Survival System is a great tool to create an survival game in low poly style. Gathering, building, crafting, sleeping, full humanoid physics based player and many more system solutions are included. Making a game is hard no matter if you are a professional, beginner or expert. Make your work easy with Survival System | Grown Assets.

Webite:  Welcome - SurvivalSystem

How to Download the Demo:

  • Download .zip file
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on GrownAssetsDemo.exe
